website_summaries.verdict: A quality anti-fatigue mat at a decent price point. Has a "cushion-like" feel underfoot that works well for many consumers.
pros: This mat has thick foam construction that relieves pain and stands up well to daily use
Available in various colors and sizes
cons: May slip on some floor surfaces, especially if it gets wet
Has a strange odor that may or may not fade over time

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality material construction
customer_reviews.text: The mat top cover is made of very poor quality brittle material. I bought this for use in my kitchen. The top layer started cracking within six months of infrequent use. After a few more months, the top layer has started to peel off and every day we need to clean up the small black fragments that break from the top layer of the mat. I do have a fatigue mat in my office that I use for six to eight hours every day and there have been no issues with it for the past >2 years of use.
customer_reviews.author: ayk456

customer_reviews.title: Commercial Bakery
customer_reviews.text: I'm a professional cake decorator, I stand on a cement floor in my bakery for 8-10 hours a day and had back aches all the time! This mat has really helped alleviate the problems. It stays in place and cleans up nicely!
customer_reviews.author: Kassie Kromminga

customer_reviews.title: Just standing at my kitchen sink for 5 minutes hurt my back so bad that I would have to take a couple of ...
customer_reviews.text: I have arthritis of the spine and severe osteoporosis and severe fibromyalgia. Just standing at my kitchen sink for 5 minutes hurt my back so bad that I would have to take a couple of pain pills and sit down and rest. Now I can stand for 15 minutes with this mat and get most of my dishes done before I have to sit down. It's like standing on a very soft cloud and I would recommend this to anyone who is interested in getting an anti fatigue mat. I also bought one to put in front of my bathroom sink, what a relief theses matts are!
customer_reviews.author: Sharli

customer_reviews.title: So squishy!
customer_reviews.text: So squishy! I bought it for my standing desk at work and I find that it's really helped with the fatigue. Most days I don't even notice that I've been standing for hours . I'm getting another for my standing desk at home.
customer_reviews.author: G&KTripleA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Me
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this. I tried a lot of different anti-fatigue mats and this is the highest quality I found. It seems like it will last a LONG time, and it's thick, good color, great grip on back, easy to clean...
customer_reviews.author: CR-Berkeley

customer_reviews.title: Awesome mats!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2...one for in front of the sink and one for in front of the stove. They are super comfy. I like being barefoot and these are perfect. Baby approved...😆.
customer_reviews.author: Doctormano

customer_reviews.title: Great quality & great value
customer_reviews.text: Great so far! This just arrived and it was shipped flat, so no crease, color is accurate, and it seems to have good grip as well as good cushion support.
customer_reviews.author: D from CT

customer_reviews.title: Now it sits in my kitchen and I love it. I got the black because it hides ...
customer_reviews.text: I've always wanted one of these because I suffer from plantar fasciitis. I went to go work an event which I knew was going to be consecutively 15hour days so with this mat, my ugly kitchen shoes with orthotics got me through some punishing work schedule. Now it sits in my kitchen and I love it. I got the black because it hides everything. I literally spray and wipe and that's it!
customer_reviews.author: Tmk

customer_reviews.title: Must have for infront of the sink.
customer_reviews.text: Great material very durable and cushiony. Came with a bit of a rubber smell so left out for night outside and the smell is gone.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Kipping

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, firmly supports feet for an extended time, shipped fast.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: 1) Shipped really fast in a large carton - flat, not "rolled"; Now it sits perfectly even on the hardwood flooring; 2) Appears to be very sturdy and flexible at the same time; 3) Provides firm slightly bouncing support to the feet; 4) No funny "rubber" or other smells (important for an allergic person); Cons: I have to deal now with lot's of "competition" from other family members including pets, who are trying to steal my mat:)
customer_reviews.author: Levap

customer_reviews.title: Soft like Butter!
customer_reviews.text: Kitchen do-over. New floor and cabinets (wip). The Gorilla Matts are soooooooo soft underfoot!!!! Almost want to cover the whole floor!
customer_reviews.author: Dom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect amount of cushion and firmness
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for myself for a Chanukah present and it's FANTASTIC. I told my kids not to go near it with shoes! I bought the wider one in gray for more cushioned walking space. May buy it as a gift for others.
customer_reviews.author: Hilary

customer_reviews.title: Bad review from shipping!
customer_reviews.text: Well despite this order specifically saying “WE SHIP FLAT” this arrived in a small box bent in half with multiple creases and for the final price of nearly $200 I am pissed. However will let them win and I will keep it because I don’t want to deal with returning. I’m HOPING the creases go away. Comfy and lightweight. I think the ones at Costco are more squishy but they didn’t have the long size I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Ckdub

customer_reviews.title: The Smelly Pad
customer_reviews.text: I was going to put this in my kitchen and was blown away by the horrid chemical smell coming from this product. The smell coming off of this is horrible. Sent it back and got something with a better name that didn't smell.
customer_reviews.author: Abraham Vladic

customer_reviews.title: Where have you been all my life
customer_reviews.text: How could i have gone so long with this my poor feet i stand alot at my job even thought i have good shoes,i still feel the hard floor on my feet then my legs this mat made a huge difference making my night go much faster and less pain
customer_reviews.author: shelly monteria

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT use in kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this mat to help ease back pain from standing at kitchen counter working. One important feature was the anti-slip grip - HA. I put it in front of my sink, water must have collected underneath it where it did not dry up. I stepped on one side and the entire mat (with my foot on it) took off like a rocket! As a 67 year old woman, I think this company's legal team should thank the heavens above that I was able to catch myself before doing any serious damage to myself. This mat is a total HAZARD in any area where water may be. Do not buy it for any application in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Smith

customer_reviews.title: Amazing mat for work or at home
customer_reviews.text: Stand all day in front of a cash register. this product definitely made my legs less tired at the end of the day. add in some compression socks and standing all day doesnt seem like such a chore at the end of the day
customer_reviews.author: daniel hong

customer_reviews.title: Smells Bad!
customer_reviews.text: Smells like mold & stale cigarettes really bad. Amazon also shipped other things I ordered in the same box and now that stuff smells like mold. I saw posts with similar complaints from 2016 and I was hoping they had fixed this problem by now.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: ... this one is that it is nowhere near as comfortably and cushy to stand on
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered one of these mats before and my main gripe with this one is that it is nowhere near as comfortably and cushy to stand on. With the other one, your feet would sink in a bit more into the mat and it really was a delight to stand on. This one provides a mild level of support and comfort but really it feels cheap and much harder than I was expecting given the price. The material is not soft enough to make much of a difference - yes it is better than standing on the floor but it's not the delight I had experienced with these types of mats before. If it matters, I weigh about 180lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Brody

customer_reviews.title: I'm in heaven...
customer_reviews.text: Received item quickly and put it in the kitchen immediately. First time washing dishes that I didn't end up w/my back aching! I've purchased other mats that cost more, didn't provide as much cushion and didn't wear well. This seems to be made much better than the others I tried and it was reasonably priced. Now, if it holds up longer than the others...
customer_reviews.author: SupportOurTroops

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: I had previously owned one of these from a kitchen store with a price tag of over $100. It finally wore out after 6 years. I didn't want to pay another $100+ so I purchased a cheap version from a home store for $29. It disintergrated after about 3 months. So I looked on amazon and purchased this one. I cannot believe how much better the cushion is on this one. It is truly so much better. I am very glad I found this one. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and does not slip
customer_reviews.text: I really like these mats. I ordered two in brown for the kitchen. I am impressed with how well they stay put. Also they are very soft and supply a level of comfort that my previous mats did not. Very pleased with product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean. Maybe too thick.
customer_reviews.text: I am a dental hygienist and have been having trouble with my back during work. I decided to stand all day to clean my patients teeth. I have used this matte for a week now. My feet do feel less fatigue however I feel it might be just a bit too thick for standing all day. What I love is that it is super easy to clean since I have to clean it between every patient. I also appreciated that it was shipped flat. Probably a five star for home use. Just not sure if it is great for all day standing.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy North

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Desk Pad Too!
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this as a desk pad and it instantly upgraded the room! The red color makes my home office POP. It's a perfect size for the keypad and mouse and the beveled edges offer great transition so I no longer need those two extra ergo pads for my wrist. Plus it still leaves desk space for other tasks and items. The bottom has a sueded feel so I'm not worried it will hurt the wood finish on the desk. An unconventional use for it but I am thrilled it worked out so well! It does have a strong odor initially but either I'm getting used to it or the odor dissipates over time.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: They don't seem to be holding up.
customer_reviews.text: The 2 mats I purchased for my kitchen seemed great at first but then the top coat finish started coming off after only a few weeks. I'm not sure how well it will wear after seeing this. They are comfortable and meet that end of my expectations but they should be more durable and long lasting. At this point I would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: debbie

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but a little bit slippery
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and I love the red color (It's not an orangey red). I'm really pleased with the quality and thickness. It was exactly what I was looking for, EXCEPT it slides around quite a bit on our laminate floor. We had to add some sticky pads to the corners to make it hold still.
customer_reviews.author: The 7 Kellys

customer_reviews.title: None of the Problems Identified in Reviews of Alternative Mat Choices
customer_reviews.text: I looked at the reviews of several alternative mats before this purchase. Among the complaints posted were intolerable chemical smell, slipping on the floor, not the color apparent in the ad, tripping hazard, curled up due to shipping box and rapid wear/deterioration. I can say that NONE of these is a problem with the Gorilla Grips we received yesterday, allowing, of course, that we don't know about the long-term wear performance yet. Seems like a great seller. Recommended. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Alonzo

customer_reviews.title: Caution!  Slippery when wet!
customer_reviews.text: I use this at my work standing 8+ hrs a day and it has helped relieve my foot and back pain from the horrible mats that my company had. The only downside that I have found is when it gets wet enough to soak through to the bottom of the mat, it gets EXTREMELY slippery and will move when walking on/off the mat. I nearly pulled a groin muscle it was so bad. I was able to remedy this by duct taping some non-slip drawer liners from the dollar store on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Bednarski

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this item because it slipped on my wood floors despite it being "Gorilla Grip". I kept having to move it back to its original spot on the wood floors. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Maren N.

customer_reviews.title: Nice and reasonably priced kitchen pads
customer_reviews.text: I received these last week and am pleased with the way they feel when I'm standing on them. The pebbly surface is non-slip, but shows dirt and crumbs a little more than my last pads. I would say the navy blue is more of a dark blue. I gave them 4 stars rather than 5 mostly because of the way they came packaged. While I appreciate that they weren't rolled up which would smash their puffiness, I would think they could be shipped in large envelopes rather than rattling around in a huge, mostly empty, box.
customer_reviews.author: pmilli

customer_reviews.title: Pain-free cooking
customer_reviews.text: Yeah, I should have bought this a long time ago. Last year, I tore my meniscus and found out after surgery that I also tore my ACL; to say the least, standing was difficult. Anyway, tonight I made dinner which took about an hour to prepare, afterwards I left the mat and felt no tightness in my lower back or knees. It works and if you have any lower body issues, do yourself a favor, get the mat.
customer_reviews.author: NIrro6

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited with the product when it arrived that I ordered a second one within a couple of days. I've had this product since Nov. 2019. But now the top is cracking and sometimes little pieces of it are missing. Occasionally, I take a black permanent marker to cover over the missing pieces. so the white underneath doesn't show through. It is a wonderful product for my feet but I am very, very disappointed in the top. In a few more months, it will all have to be thrown out in the garbage. I think that it should last much longer at that cost. Top of mat is not durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely serves it's purpose!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a stand up desk and wanted something to stand on while I work at it. This mat definitely serves its purpose and came as expected, it is just a little harder than I anticipated (that may be by design for an ergonomic reason..). I feel like in the market of "anti-fatigue" mats, this is a front runner and was decently priced, so I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: I don’t recommend on it’s own
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work out so well for me on its own. I purchased a different brand that is soft and 1 inch thick to go underneath this one. Between the two mats, now everything is good. But I had to spend about $80 to achieve this! I am very disappointed but what are you going to do? When you have back and knee pain it’s worth getting rid of! The two of them stacked together work very well. It looks funny and they are different sizes and different brands and thickness but I only care really about the pain relief.
customer_reviews.author: M Bear

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Mat... sturdy, looks great, cleanups well. I bought one but will be purchasing 2 more for my kitchen. I am short and needed something to make me just about 1/2-1 inch high when at the stove or rolling out cookie dough at the island, It does just that.
customer_reviews.author: P. Graham

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had the product for two months and it’s already cracking
customer_reviews.author: Matthew H.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Arthritis sufferers!
customer_reviews.text: I have Rheumatoid Arthritis which makes preparing meals and washing dishes very painful... this wonderful mat relieves my pain and I can actually prepare a meal without tapping out halfway through because my back and feet are killing me. It not only helps with pain relief... it's really quite attractive! It's super sturdy, it came in a flat, very large box, and stays in place... which is important for a disabled person like myself with balance issues. The price was excellent, the quality is awesome and I plan to buy a smaller one to place in front of my stove. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Juanta Bennett-Griffin

customer_reviews.title: IN love with this
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could cover all the flooring in my house with this material – not joking. We have super-hard cement right under our carpet and vinyl floors, and gosh . . . this thing is saving our backs when washing dishes in the kitchen. We will scoot it over to the countertop for chopping veggies/baking, or even over to the stove if we're going to spend time there. I think we need 3 now :) Highly recommend this one!
customer_reviews.author: Ewok Talk

customer_reviews.title: Color not accurate
customer_reviews.text: Nice mat, good quality and very comfortable. I ordered two of the "navy" mats. I would say they are more of a baby blue than navy. They are way lighter than I wanted for my kitchen but I am keeping them anyways due to the hassle of returning and mainly bc they are good quality. I wouldn't say they are super easy to clean as my child put a scuff mark on one very easily and it won't come off with any cleaner or amount of scrubbing. Where I did scrub it left a dull spot on the mat, which kind of sucks. Overall I would consider it a good mat though.
customer_reviews.author: Rachal Leyva

customer_reviews.title: Little bit of slippage but nice cushion for you feet
customer_reviews.text: I use this mat with my standing desk at work. I have generally been happy with it, but it does have issues with slowly slipping around throughout the day. The cushioning material itself is nice and helps keep fatigue away during the work day. I recommend figuring out some sort of way to adhere it to the floor if you are putting this on top of carpet, because it won't stay in place on carpet. Tile or hardwood floors will likely be fine, though.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Shaker

customer_reviews.title: Make your life easier with Gorilla Grip!!️
customer_reviews.text: We love our Gorilla Grip floor mats!!️ We bought one for our kitchen when we moved as an interim last summer. Now, we’ve moved to our permanent residence, and the floors are very hard. So we ought 2 additional mats for the kitchen (previous one at the sink and now one in front of the stove and one at the food prep area) and 2 smaller ones for the bathroom. They are very comfortable to stand on, reduce strain, and make morning/evening bathroom routines and kitchen use much more pleasant. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne Weiss-Harrison, M.D.

customer_reviews.title: Great mats
customer_reviews.text: The mat is thick and comfortable to stand on. It can slide around a bit but have not had it happen when I’m standing on it or moving around in the kitchen. Easy to clean. Water wipes up fast and it has been easy to sweep. Hoping it will last for a long time. The only issue is that Amazon did not ship it flat so there is a permanent crease in the mat. (70x24) I thought about asking for a replacement but figured the same thing would happen again and it would just be a huge hassle. The 60x20 I ordered was shipped flat.
customer_reviews.author: Dynamix

customer_reviews.title: Edges curling
customer_reviews.text: The edges of the mat are curling. I waited to write a review because I thought the curling would eventually go away with use but it progressively got worse. I bought 3 different sizes and the 2 larger sizes had significant curling around the edges. It is a trip hazard, it looks terrible, and my robot vacuum gets stuck on the edge of the mat.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Super squishy, too soft for long-term use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my standing desk, but it's too soft and squishy to stand on for very long. This doesn't feel at all like an actual anti-fatigue mat like I've used in kitchens and such, but then this is the bargain version, so understandable. I have it by my kitchen sink now, and it's fine for the brief spurts of dishwashing.
customer_reviews.author: sunspoon

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful support and pain relief!
customer_reviews.text: I love these mats! I had not been able to prepare and cook a dinner in quite some time because of back and hip pain (even wearing my Tevas.) I can now prepare dinner, or wash up the dishes. The mats are holding up fine and I believe it will last. (My mom has one that is several years old that looks new.) We wear our Tevas (supportive sandals/shoes) when we're working in the kitchen on these mats, but they hold up great and make it possible for me to actually get something done! I highly recommend guerrilla mats!
customer_reviews.author: GaGa Nana

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: Bought the 24"w x 17"d to accompany my new Airlift Sit/Stand Desk Converter (Model OFF 65890 thru Amazon - awesome) because I knew it would conflict with my sit position rolling desk chair legs and need to move. It grips enough that I have to lift to move even on my hardboard chair pad but is exactly what I wanted. Standing on this is like a 'cloud'. My photos do not do justice as the beveled transition walking off or on is nearly unnoticeable. After researching everything on Amazon I am glad I chose this one.
customer_reviews.author: Harry S.

customer_reviews.title: cushiony, but slides!!
customer_reviews.text: the mat is soft & cushiony, but slides so badly! i put it by my kitchen sink & it never stays in place. it doesn’t stick to the floor at all. i’ve never had a kitchen mat & had this problem before. i would return but i already recycled the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: beachbabi78

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Not a lot of sizzle, it's just a floor mat. But I wouldn't be able to use my desk without it. Very soft, but firm...does a great job of cushioning. I have paid more for thinner mats, this is a great value. Occasionally, it will get a ding (depression) from my chair or shoes, or a box, but next time I notice it, the surface is smooth again. It's memory is better than mine!
customer_reviews.author: R. Stockton

customer_reviews.title: it SMELLS
customer_reviews.text: I can't comment on it's durability since I didn't use it, but it seems well made. If the strong smell doesn't bother you then you'll probably like it. I aired it out, outside, for days and it still smells, so I'm returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not my kind
customer_reviews.text: It’s too thick for me because I’d like to be able to pull out the bottom drawer of my oven and I can’t with these mat. You’d also think the thickness will help with it be softer but it’s way too hard for my liking. I was going to return it but my son threw away all the wrappings and labels the mat came in. *cries* So I’m going to save it and possibly use it in my basement when they’re done renovating it.
customer_reviews.author: YL

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this mat
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this mat. Everyone should have one at their sink. It really helps relieve the leg strain from standing and washing dishes. Why do you think restaurants have anti-fatigue mats in their kitchens?
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Ranft

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little mat. Its perfect for encouraging me to stand at my desk (when otherwise I would be a lazy bum and sit the entire day) because it helps my knees and back not feel like I'm 90 years old (I'm only 30.) Really great purchase! This size is perfect for standing in one spot all day long, I'd probably go a little bigger for a sink at home or something similar.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Ozanich

customer_reviews.title: High quality mat.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mat to cover my ceramic floor below my kitchen sink. Every thing about the mat was excellent. I had to return because of the thickness in under my feet. I am an elderly woman and I sunk into the mat in such a way it threw my balance off. I was afraid of tripping. Most people probably would not have that problem.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie B.

customer_reviews.title: A little slippery but great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this mat. Very cushioned and attractive in my kitchen. My ONLY complaint is that the surface is slippery when wearing socks. Otherwise it's great!
customer_reviews.author: JAG

customer_reviews.title: This mat is great! I bought 3 for my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This mat is great! I bought 3 for my kitchen. One is in front of the sink, one in front of my stove, and one in front of my prep area. We spend alot of time in the kitchen visiting with family and friends. I am always standing on the mats. The only downside for me is I purchased mine in black. The mats show every spec of dirt that is on them. My fault for picking black.
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: Reduces standing fatigue, lightweight, well made, seems durable
customer_reviews.text: I use this to reduce fatigue from standing for hours with an electric guitar for long recording sessions. It works great for a large man, has just the right balance of firmness and cushion. The exterior is durable, and it is fairly lightweight and the color choices were perfect. Although it is a bit stiff to roll up for transport, it is still easily portable. It also does not slip on flooring materials. It stays flat, and the edges are sloped to avoid being tripped over. To me, this looks like will last a long, long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great office mate
customer_reviews.text: I teach health classes and my desk time is mostly spent at a standing desk (which is awesome!) but my feet (especially my heels) and legs start to ache after awhile. I ordered this mat after having had one in our kitchen for standing on to make dishes/food prepping more enjoyable. This has made my standing desk time much more enjoyable as well, and no body aches or heel pain after standing on it for 2+ hours at a time! Weird smell to it at first but it wears off. Great grip on the bottom, easy to clean on the top.
customer_reviews.author: Wifey22

customer_reviews.title: The good, the bad, and the ugly
customer_reviews.text: So I will start with what I like about it. It definitely is nice to stand on for extended periods. Relieves a lot of pain and comfortable. It is hard to clean, easy to stain, and any little bit of water that gets under the mats they slide like crazy. Overall I love them for the pain relief, but grip is only good when dry completely and o shouldn’t have to clean my mats in the shower and still have them stained.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonSwamy

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I got this to put in front of my stove 2 years ago and i would highly recommend! It’s durable, true to color as shown here, and absolutely helps with foot and leg fatigue while cooking. I wasn’t sure about spending the amount of money necessary for the name brand, but I don’t regret a thing. Some of the liner on the back did rip as I tried to vacuum it off, but it does not affect the function or design at all. Still recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, and perfect for kitchen use.
customer_reviews.text: The gorilla grip mat is excellent quality, thicker than most, with a graded edge. I placed one in a boat galley (kitchen), in front of the sink/counter. It's an excellent choice, in large part because of easy easy clean up, from food and liquids that tend to fall from the counter. I found it to be competitively priced for premium mats, with good color and materials manufacturing. It's a nice and much appreciated touch, to ship it flat. It can be put to use in middle age without any rolling or bunching. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Item arrived damaged - Unable to clean the permanent scuff!
customer_reviews.text: While this may not be the sellers fault, the item arrived damaged. USPS had to completely re-tape the box. The mat was filthy, with foot prints all over it front and back. There is a long scuff mark which after cleaning the mat, even with Magic Eraser, I'm unable to remove it. The blue rubber color may be scratched off. It looks unsightly. I won't return the mat because it's a complete hassle but can't say I'm not disappointed with the shipping and presence of the mat upon arrival. Aside from the condition, the item itself, it is as described for color, size and cushion thickness.
customer_reviews.author: Kim, California

customer_reviews.title: The best anti-fatigue mats!
customer_reviews.text: These mats are so comfortable. I’ve been experiencing flare-ups of lower back pain during my pregnancy; I have long struggled with back pain, especially after standing for long periods of time. I bought the 39” mat for the sink and the shorter one for the stove..these are perfectly sized for those uses. The mats are lightweight and thick and comfortable. I also love that they are shipped flat, so there are no issues with sides persistently flaring up.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsi V

customer_reviews.title: Just great
customer_reviews.text: I had purchase a black one a smaller one and for anyone that spends long hours standing this is definitely a must it has been game-changing I feel less fatigue on my legs and my feet so I went and I got the blue one and all I have to say is it's a great investment even if your job doesn't provide you with this type of mat get it for yourself it is well worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: shelly monteria

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, non-slip comfort mat
customer_reviews.text: Had received the same mat in a smaller size (20 x 32 inch) as a gift about a year ago. That mat is extremely comfortable to stand on while working in kitchen and has held up well with no visible wear. Has not broken down or compressed at all. Never slips. Ordered the larger size (20 x 39 inch) for in front of stove. Received today and pleased to report it is of equal quality to the one we had received as a gift. Came laying flat so no creases or damage in shipping. Definitely recommend this product to take some stress off feet, legs and knees.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: DURABILITY ISSUE
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these mats. one for in front of the stove and one for in front of the sink. I love them and everyone who comes over loves them. However, about 2 months ago, one of them is bunching up and the whole logo is almost gone. It is the one I least use. Help, I am very dissatisfied with this one.
customer_reviews.author: cdubin

customer_reviews.title: I love this mat!
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad to have this in my kitchen! I have a tile floor and this is a dream to stand on and clean. I used to have fabric kitchen rugs and I was always throwing them in the washing machine and they would look dirty after a few days again. This mat wipes clean so easily, I highly recommend, it's well worth the price. Also, I got a second mat that has a pretty picture on it and while it is good, it's not as cushy to stand on. This one is clearly superior so spend a little extra $ and get the one you want.
customer_reviews.author: BrettHMorris

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly pleasant!
customer_reviews.text: We placed this mat in front of our kitchen sink to make our time rinsing dishes a little more comfortable. Due to it's location in the kitchen it does not it's fair share of use and dirt/grease, but we've found the mat very easy to clean. The nice beveled edge keeps us from tripping over it as we move through the kitchen and it stays in place without shifting or slipping. I may just buy a second one to keep on hand for when this one eventually succumbs to wear and tear, but so far it seems like that will take some time. I would recommend it to others as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jolee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: My chiropractor recommended using a gel mat with my standing desk and I chose this one based on the positive reviews. It did not disappoint! I work from home so I spend several hours in front of the computer. I stand on it barefoot, again as suggested by my chiropractor for maximum benefit, and I love it. My lower back issues have greatly improved by avoiding hours of sitting while at work. This mat allows me to stand comfortably at my computer and now I couldn't work without it. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: shaboom

customer_reviews.title: Need to make sure that there is no water on your surface or you will fal
customer_reviews.text: What a let everybody know that when I bought these mats that there was no disclaimer regarding the water underneath the mats they are not just slippery they are extremely dangerous when they get wet they basically fly out from under you and I have suffered falls multiple times so just beware that if you get any water under those mats and you step on them you will go down for that reason I'm not giving these mats 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helps relieve/prevent pain in legs & feet
customer_reviews.text: We use this to make it more comfortable when we’re washing dishes. As we don’t have a dishwasher, we can end up spending a lot of time standing at the sink. This helps a lot to relieve and/or prevent leg and foot pain. It’s decent looking also. I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 because it shifts a little bit on the floor and wish it was a bit thicker. But for the price, it’s a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Lexis

customer_reviews.title: Very High Quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these , one for in front of the sink, and one for in front of stove...perfect fit, they are very comfortable to stand on & clean very well...The mats are made with quality materials and give my feet and legs relief when standing to wash dishes or cook ....Good price , took a while to ship, but with the pandemic, I was pleased to get them as quickly as I did....Excellent product
customer_reviews.author: harley 09

customer_reviews.title: Did not work as I thought it would
customer_reviews.text: I have a standing desk and I was hoping this mat would provide some relief for my feet. That was not the case. No matter what shoes I wore (or even when barefoot) the mat did not relieve any soreness. I actually felt better standing on the hardwood floor than this mat. I would not buy again. However, it was easy to clean/
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Wright

customer_reviews.title: Quality mat
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised at the quality. Pros, comfortable to stand on Thick Nice color Easy to clean Solid, not flimsy Cons, Could be a bit longer without being wider. I wanted a longer mat, not available without going wider. A bit pricey
customer_reviews.author: Barbboo66

customer_reviews.title: Couldnt be more pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect. More than I expected. The measurement was 70 in. and it fits like it was custom made and it is sooo soft and yet is very supportive. I am so pleased. I got the brown and it is exactly the color on the display. Was delivered when promised and in great condition,. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Cushy and stands up to shoes
customer_reviews.text: I use this product with my standing desk, and the two are perfect companions. I like that the mat does not slip underneath me when I walk across it, and I notice a difference standing on it even while wearing shoes. After about a month or two of use it doesn't really show any wear or damage from my soles. That said, it's taken a while for the rubbery smell to dissipate; another comment suggests leaving it outside overnight to eliminate the odor. Besides that, it's perfect for my use and beats similar products that I've used before at other workplaces.
customer_reviews.author: EHerboo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: We ordered two Gorilla Grip premium anti-fatigue comfort mats for our kitchen in our new condo. The floor is ceramic tile and extremely hard. These mats are a life-saver. We would not be able to work in our kitchen standing directly on the tile. Mats are thick and cushy. Smooth and easy to wipe clean. They were shipped flat with no creases and we purchased a 70" mat. Both came in boxes large enough to remain flat. We've purchased cheaper mats in the past and were not as satisfied. Much more economical than replacing the tile. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: S. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but effects my posture
customer_reviews.text: It is an over all sturdy, heavy, squishy enough mat and cats don't seem to try scratching it yet so far so it stays in place. I need to stand without shoes on it though because otherwise it affects my posture, most of the weight goes on my heels then it hurts my back more. I find it useful and bought it for $24 when it was on sale so I am happy for the price point/service ratio.
customer_reviews.author: E. Wisdom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect, thick and soft yet firm enough so that you feel stable. I work at a computer 8 hours a day and stand for about 80% of that time (I have a standing desk) so I really need a pad that is thick enough so my feet don’t hurt but firm enough so I feel stable standing and moving around on it, this pad delivers on all of that
customer_reviews.author: Michael K

customer_reviews.title: Thick mat that doesn’t slip
customer_reviews.text: I love this for baking for long hours. It didn’t slip at all and was easy to clean up after I made a mess. Just vacuum and wipe. I just finished making 300 cookies for a baby shower and this saved my feet and knees! If I had been standing on the floor for all those hours it would have been awful! I would purchase this again for sure!!
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mat, it does most of what it's supposed to except grip the floor along edges. When I where flip flops, they get stuck under there and I have to catch myself. It is nice and thick, cleans easily and doesnt slide around. So I'm gonna deal w it rather then send it back, w all the work USPS is already swamped with. (I thought it would be rolled up and sent that way, nope, it was layed flat in a giant box I could fit my stove in.) I live on cape cod and the trash situation here is awful. I couldn't believe it when I saw this giant box.
customer_reviews.author: L. Hickey

customer_reviews.title: Small, but very comfortable standing mat!
customer_reviews.text: This has been my favorite quarantine purchase. With the shift to working from home, this has allowed me to stand and work on my laptop and minimized any pain, from standing on a hard surface. I highly recommend! It is small enough that it can fit into a smaller apartment and not take up too much space. It would also be perfect for a standing mat near the kitchen to do dishes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get them
customer_reviews.text: These are fabulous. Even though I'm a terrible cook - I do spend a fair amount of time standing at the stove or at the sink. These are so comfortable that I've started using them with my bare feet. I normally do not walk around in bare feet as the floor is too hard on my feet. But these are super cushy! They are also easy to clean and I can vacuum right over the top of them.
customer_reviews.author: SaraJaneSmith

customer_reviews.title: A great mat that makes standing easy
customer_reviews.text: I recently remodeled my house with hardwood floors throughout. With the engineered wood flooring I have in place now, it's critical that I keep water off the surface. In my kitchen, the wood extends there, so I bought 2 of these mats. Not only do the mats make standing while cooking + washing dishes a lot more comfortable, it protects the wood flooring from the light splashes of water from the sink and oil from the cooking area. From a design standpoint, I bought the dark grey color and it matches my countertops elegantly as well. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Jason L Wang

customer_reviews.title: bad
customer_reviews.text: I was going to put this in my kitchen and was blown away by the horrid chemical smell coming from this product.It gave me a massive headache to be around this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Logan

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy, fits perfect and doesn’t slip
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a little stress relief while I’m doing dishes. Added bonus was the length options they had available. We had a little water damage to our floor boards so they are a little bowed. This mat has done great covering it up until we can replace them. It’s very very comfortable. It doesn’t slip at all. If you want to shift it in the slightest you have to lift it up and move it. It’s nice and thick and the edges are graded so you don’t trip as you go on or off the mat. Definitely a keeper! It’s super easy to clean. I just use my mop or a cloth.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Lyon

customer_reviews.title: Why did i wait?
customer_reviews.text: I resisted buying this product as i thought it would look too industrial. Boy, was I wrong. I purchased two, one to place in front of the sink the other to place in front of the stove. Once placed they do not move-unlike the rugs i had used. They are not heavy and easy to pick up, easy to wash and comfortable to stand on. The kittens do not scratch on them and now after a few months they still look brand new. I bought the red ones.
customer_reviews.author: bw878

customer_reviews.title: Great Comfort Mat For Job-Sites
customer_reviews.text: We purchased two as these mats for our current residential construction jobsite for interior work, in which workers have to stand for extended periods of time (i.e. staining doors). One of our painters had a foot injury and these mats made a HUGE difference in that individuals comfort. These mats definitely helped increase overall work production.
customer_reviews.author: Tahoe Gal

customer_reviews.title: The rugs cracked after using them for a month.
customer_reviews.text: The rugs cracked after 1 month of use. I only used warm soapy water to clean them with. The return window closed 5 days after cracks became visible. Will NOT buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin R.

customer_reviews.title: Gorilla, Indeed!!
customer_reviews.text: We needed two mats for our kitchen to replace two that had seen better days and we found these. They were delivered promptly and, indeed, they were shipped flat. They are substantial, well made and feel wonderful underfoot. Spills wipe up easily and debris sweeps right off. In addition, they do not slide on the tile floor: they stay where one places them. We love our new red mats!! Well done!!
customer_reviews.author: Director70

customer_reviews.title: Color is off...
customer_reviews.text: The mat is exactly the thickness and comfort that I was looking for. However, the color that I thought I ordered is way off from what was described. Plus the amount of packaging to get it here was silly. This is one item I would purchase in a store, not online.
customer_reviews.author: NMS

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. The pattern on top is very plain, which is exactly what I wanted, no patterns to conflict with anything in my kitchen. The bottom is surprisingly grippy. I have had previous ergo mats, and I could just shove them around with my foot. This one sticks in place and needs to be moved by picking it up and putting it down, which I am happy to do. I didn't even realize I would like that feature, until this one needed it.
customer_reviews.author: VMTP

customer_reviews.title: Mat on carpet moves and have to readjust continually
customer_reviews.text: Definitely helps with fatigue. Stand at my desk and able to work up to 12 hours/day with three breaks. The only issue is that the mat keeps moving over carpet and have to continually reposition. BOTHERSOME!
customer_reviews.author: Madison Reed Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Looks good.
customer_reviews.text: We have tile floors. Mat is used by sink. On three occasions water was spilled by accident. Some of the water seeped under mat. When walked on it slid like it was on ice. I fell flat on my back but was not injured. If water is spilled on floor near mat we pick it up and dry the bottom .
customer_reviews.author: Coopstoy

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste money !!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t recommend anyone waste there money ! Iv had these for about a month and they are already discoloring, tearing, the bottom part is falling off, there are holes in them .We do not wear shoes in our home so I’m not sure why they aren’t lasting ! They are not comfortable at all in anyway or shape !!
customer_reviews.author: jacob faul

customer_reviews.title: Easy to move
customer_reviews.text: I hesitated to get a mat because I need to move it when I want to sit and didn't want to have to bend over and pick it up during meetings. This one slides out of the way easily on my carpet with one foot. It also has beveled edges so I don't knock the edge when moving around. I'm happy with the firmness, and the quality.
customer_reviews.author: PowerMom

customer_reviews.title: An anti-fatigue mat reduces stress on your back
customer_reviews.text: This mat is well made and looks good (has sloping edges) If you are using a standing desk for part of your day, these mats make it more comfortable than standing on a hard floor or carpet. In addition to providing pain relief, the mats keep you moving your legs slightly which helps muscles and circulation.
customer_reviews.author: R Colton

customer_reviews.title: Love at first feel
customer_reviews.text: These are great mats. My feet were killing me night after night of cooking dinners. I didn’t want to spend a crazy amount though. I saw similar mats in Bed, Bath and Beyond and I just could not talk myself into spending that much. Then Boom! I found these mats on Amazon and it was love at first feel. They aren’t slippery on the top or the bottom. Very comfortable and very easy to wipe clean.
customer_reviews.author: Moxie Maven

customer_reviews.title: Squishy but not that grippy
customer_reviews.text: The mat is big and soft and takes a load off when working long hours. However it doesn’t grip as well as I thought it would. It moves about an inch per day and has to be adjusted back into the spot I picked for it about every day. Mind you I picked an exactly 70” counter side to put this so it’s very obvious when it isn’t in the right spot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this mat!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this kitchen mat. I ordered it because I do a lot of cooking and cleaning up, and was getting achy and fatigued. The mat really helps, not only because of the softness underfoot, but because it also rises me up slightly so I work at the sink more comfortably. I also really like being able to wipe it clean at the end of the day so easily, which I cannot do with a rug mat.
customer_reviews.author: Lala

customer_reviews.title: Relieves heel/foot pain when standing long time
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses this in the garage when he’s working in one spot for a longer time. It has help with heel and knee pain he used to get standing on cement— it’s not paper light but I don’t expect it to be. It’s very durable!
customer_reviews.author: Susie

product_meta.title: GORILLA GRIP Original Premium Anti-Fatigue Comfort Mat, Phthalate Free, Ships Flat, Ergonomically Engineered, Extra Support and Thick, Kitchen and Office Standing Desk, 32x20, Black
feature_bullets: Gorilla Grip Durability While You Cook Or Work From Home: Whether you’re whipping up a meal in the kitchen or transforming your house into your new office space, working from home can be tough. That’s why our mats are built from premium strength materials that will not break down or compress over time, so they’re the superior choice for a better in-home workspace, whether it be in the kitchen or your home office! Also a great choice for any other high-trafficked area where you need support.

Not All Mats Are Created Equally: beautifully designed, extra thick 3/4" ergonomically engineered GORILLA GRIP mat features highest-grade foam to eliminate pressure and provide superior support over long periods of time. Non-toxic, Prop 65 compliant, and phthalate-free. Textured surface and advanced beveled edge design helps prevent tripping. Easy-to-clean, stain-resistant material can be vacuumed or wiped with a damp cloth.
/!\ Warning: Prevent Slipping & Tripping – This mat is NOT slip-resistant. Wipe up water that gets on or under mat. If mat edges curl, discontinue use. For indoor use only.
Ships Flat: Not rolled for shipping to avoid unwanted creases and curled edges.

10-Year Guarantee: If you are at all unsatisfied with your product, please contact us (through Amazon if past the standard return window) and we will be happy to provide you with your choice of a replacement or refund. Buy today and join the millions of satisfied former foot, knee, joint, leg, and back pain sufferers that are enjoying better posture, muscle conditioning and improved overall health and well-being.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,050 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: GORILLA GRIP Original 3/4" Premium Anti-Fatigue Comfort Mat
